name: PHPickerConfiguration
desc: An object that contains information about how to configure a picker view controller.

items.name: init(photoLibrary: PHPhotoLibrary)
items.desc: Creates a new configuration object for a photo library.

items.name: var filter: PHPickerFilter?
items.desc: The filter you apply to restrict the asset types the picker displays.

items.name: struct PHPickerFilter
items.desc: A type that defines the filter to apply to the photo library.

items.name: var preferredAssetRepresentationMode: PHPickerConfiguration.AssetRepresentationMode
items.desc: A mode that determines which representation to use if an asset contains more than one.

items.name: enum PHPickerConfiguration.AssetRepresentationMode
items.desc: Constants identifying the mode the system uses when many representations exist for an asset.

items.name: enum PHPickerConfigurationAssetRepresentationMode
items.desc: Constants identifying the mode the system uses when many representations exist for an asset.

items.name: var preselectedAssetIdentifiers: [String]
items.desc: An array of asset identifiers to preselect in the picker.

items.name: var selectionLimit: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of selections the user can make.

items.name: var selection: PHPickerConfiguration.Selection
items.desc: The selection behavior for the picker.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the hasher.

items.name: static func == (PHPickerConfiguration, PHPickerConfiguration) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two configurations are equal.

items.name: static func != (PHPickerConfiguration, PHPickerConfiguration) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two configurations are not equal.
